member.name: T:Primavera.Hydrogen.DesignTime.IntegrationTesting.AspNetCore.IdentityServer4.IdentityTestServer
member.summary: Provides a test server that hosts an instance of Identity Server that can be used for integration testing.
member.remarks: This test server allows configuring the API resources, clients, etc. to emulate the authentication/authorization flows.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.DesignTime.IntegrationTesting.AspNetCore.IdentityServer4.IdentityTestServer.TestServer
member.summary: Gets the instance.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.DesignTime.IntegrationTesting.AspNetCore.IdentityServer4.IdentityTestServer.ServiceProvider
member.summary: Gets the service provider.
Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The identity resources that should be configured. Optional.
The API resources that should be configured. Optional.
The clients that should be configured. Optional.
A delegate that should be used to configure the application configuration. Optional. Runs after the test server configuration is set.
A delegate that should be used to configure the application services. Optional. Runs after the test server configuration is set.
A delegate that should be used to configure the application. Optional. Runs after the test server configuration is set.
